contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Cynux Security OS is 100% open source. We welcome contributions to our code and docs.

events.title: Events
events.description: Learn more about Cynux OS and meet us in person! We're appearing at conferences, meetups, and talks around the world.
events.mobileDescription: Come to hear more about Cynux OS

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: There are many ways to learn about Cynux OS: check out our documentation, our blogs and monthly Heartbeats, recommended reads, and more.

meet.title: Community
meet.description: Ask questions, find answers, and connect with the Cynux community.

events.title: PyData Global
